page.title: 12Events round Ruan Minor 1
page.content: There are about ten local events that take place round Ruan Minor every year.During the last week of August a carnival is held in the recreation ground.People that wish to enter will dress up in fancy dress or decorate a float.Then first, second and third winners are chosen. There is a spring show,a summer show and an autumn show.You can enter things like art,needlework or even handwriting and vegetables. Every summer there is a regatta.It is held on the beach at Cadgwith.There are competitions for people that like swimming,diving and rowing.There are different races for different ages.At the end cups are presented to the winners.
